alert.note: Alert for Shackelford (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Shackelford County through 645 PM CDT... At 600 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Mccarty Lake, or 9 miles northeast of Hamby, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mccarty Lake and Us-283 Near The Callahan-Shackelford County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
